name: sgvn-sistema
description: Sistema de Gestão de Vistorias Náuticas

scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:all:build: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:frontend:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend-react && npm install
scripts.test:coverage:all: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.pre-push:coverage: npm run test:coverage:all && npm run validate:coverage

author: Wuelliton96
